name: Squash the Creeps 3D (Paul Hanzlik)
description:
Jump on small creeps to take out bigger creeps

You can use WASD and Spacebar to move and jump, or left joystick and left trigger to move and jump on controller.  Squashing a small creep nets 1 point,  a medium creep nets 2 points, and a large creep nets 3 points. Getting hit resets your score.

Web version supports only basic lighting

For a better looking experience please the Linux or Windows desktop executable.

Feel free to reuse this games source code and assets

Game code is under MIT license and all media assets are Public Domain.  You can download them from this Codeberg repository.

Special thanks to Godot and Blender Contributors

Their work is what makes little projects like this easy and fun!

Known bugs

  • Small creeps can clip through floor
  • Creeps will "rubber band" around the arena
